UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A venom-derived neurotoxin, CsTx-1, from the spider Cupiennius salei exhibits cytolytic activities.
Literature.Author: Kuhn-Nentwig L, Fedorova IM, Lüscher BP, Kopp LS, Trachsel C, Schaller J, Vu XL, Seebeck T, Streitberger K, Nentwig W, Sigel E, Magazanik LG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(no activity data),Escherichia coli SBS 363(MIC=4.66-9.32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>149µM),Trypanosoma brucei brucei MiTat1.2(221)(EC50=5.01µM),Drosophila melanogaster(LD50=82.64nmol/g)
